remarks: Define a complex module, which is just a left module over a subring of ` CC ` , which allows us to use conventional addition, multiplication, etc. in the left module theorems.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
df-clm $p |- CMod = { w e. LMod | [. ( Scalar ` w ) / f ]. [. ( Base ` f ) / k ]. ( f = ( CCfld |`s k ) /\ k e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) } $.
$d f k w $.
